Name: [DeliveryService's] Well Prepared
Desc:
[Author/作者]
    
deliveryservice
    
[Description/简介]
    
This mod adds starting experiences for extra points (+4, +14, +34, +74) and starting disciples. (+3, +4)
    
I am accepting request and suggestion, in case you want additional perks added.
    
Contact me via Official Discord Server. my aliases: deliveryservice, or seraphirate
Author: DeliveryService
IncreasedDesc:
1.1 - Fixed typo and formatting.
    
1.2 - fixed dependency grouping to vanilla for more disciples starting story.
    
1.3 - Changed names and description to make it better, changed the first additional disciple tier to add +2 disciple instead of +3
